title: California National Historic Trail: Auto Tour Route - Missouri
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Auto Tour Route - Missouri                Auto Tour Route - Missouri       Below the map are driving directions to follow the auto tour route of the California National Historic Trail west from Missouri       NPS Image      From St. Joseph, Missouri:  1. Take U.S. Route 36 west.  From Independence, Missouri:  1. Take U.S. Route 24 west to Interstate 435. 2. Turn south onto Interstate 435. 3. Take Interstate 435 west into Kansas.  Total original route miles in Missouri: 18
